name: Totally Safe Firemen Training! Now for Kids for the GMTK JAM 2020
name_original: Totally Safe Firemen Training! Now for Kids for the GMTK JAM 2020
description:
Totally Safe Firemen Training! is made for the GMTK JAM 2020 . 

Totally Safe Firemen Training is now available for Kids as the Developer believe Kids can also be a firemen. (also if they die they add less mass to the already burning fire then adults!)

Controls:

Use the pressure of the hose to swing the kid to extinguish the fire.

P.S. The tone here is meant to be sarcastic and funny so don't quote me on that.
